attributes.action: Invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty Immediately
attributes.additional_details: In waiting for a new Conservative leader, Cameron and the Government are breaking his promise to the citizens of the UK.
attributes.background: Now that the UK's EU Referendum has been completed, David Cameron must invoke Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty immediately. Not to do so would be undemocratic, and create further unrest and unease in national and international markets.
